languages.text: This charge is special-made to be used against armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: This charge is special-made to be used against armoured vehicles.

languages.text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.
languages.original_text: Такие снаряды разработаны специально для уничтожения техники с тяжелой броней.

traits.locale_text: This charge is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.
This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

languages.text: Такие снаряды разработаны специально для уничтожения техники с тяжелой броней.
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

languages.text: Bu top mermisi, ağır zırhı araçlara karşı kullanmak üzere özel olarak tasarlanmıştır.
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: Bu top mermisi, ağır zırhı araçlara karşı kullanmak üzere özel olarak tasarlanmıştır.

languages.text: Este obús está diseñado específicamente para utilizarse contra vehículos fuertemente blindados.
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: Este obús está diseñado específicamente para utilizarse contra vehículos fuertemente blindados.

languages.text: 这种炮弹专门用来对付重型装甲载具。
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: 这种炮弹专门用来对付重型装甲载具。

languages.text: Cet obus est conçu pour détruire les véhicules lourdement blindés.
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: Cet obus est conçu pour détruire les véhicules lourdement blindés.

languages.text: このシェルは、特に重装甲車両に対して使用する目的で設計されている。
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: このシェルは、特に重装甲車両に対して使用する目的で設計されている。

languages.text: Diese Granate wurde für die Zerstörung schwer gepanzerter Fahrzeuge konzipiert.
languages.original_text: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

traits.locale_text: Diese Granate wurde für die Zerstörung schwer gepanzerter Fahrzeuge konzipiert.
